channel.title: How Can I Add Pvp Tokens
channel.description:
Hello, so im making a pvp server and i want to add into my server some tickets so that if i kill some one i will get a random amout of tickets EVERY time 5-10 tickets a time i have already make the tickets but i just wanna know how to make them drop when a player dies (random amounts from 5 - to - 10)
Thakns

item.title: How Can I Add Pvp Tokens
item.dc:creator: @taylor08 taylor08
item.description:
@taylor08 wrote:

ok thanks ill search for it hope this workes[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2009, 04:04:06 am[/size][hr]yeh i get like 1 error when i add that ground.addItem(4278, 5+misc.random(5));[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2009, 02:03:51 am[/size][hr]sorry to bring this back up but i STILL cant find it but this 1 looks the best: ground.addItem(ticketID, 5+misc.random(5));
just wont work

but if any one knows still plz post

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Add Pvp Tokens

item.title: How Can I Add Pvp Tokens
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

The createGrounditem method should still be in your Item class. If Delta renamed it, you should be able to find it still.

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Add Pvp Tokens

item.title: How Can I Add Pvp Tokens
item.dc:creator: @taylor08 taylor08
item.description:
@taylor08 wrote:

yeh i get that right ill be back in a bit Thanks

EDIT: 1 thing, im using a delta so errm will it be in ??

item.title: How Can I Add Pvp Tokens
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Use the createGroundItem method in the Item class (for most wL servers) to drop them upon the player’s death.

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Add Pvp Tokens

item.title: How Can I Add Pvp Tokens
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

I don’t know the exact method, but you can guess what my point is:

When someone dies:
ground.addItem(ticketID, 5+misc.random(5));

Get my point?

Read full topic
